titleStmt.title: The varietie of memorable and worthy matters. By Walter Owsolde
titleStmt.author: Owsolde, Walter.

publicationStmt.publisher: By I[ames] R[oberts] for Ieffery Charlton and are to be solde at his shoppe, at the great north doore of Paules,

notesStmt.note: Another state, STC 19002, omits printer's initials in imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: his shoppe, at the great north doore of Paules
